inclusion.criterion: Elective procedures involving total mesorectal excision
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: American Society of Anesthesiologists (ASA) class I-III
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Ability to understand and the willingness to sign a written informed consent
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients who received neoadjuvant chemotherapy and/or radiation treatments will be included
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients undergoing emergent or urgent surgery
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of urinary retention after previous procedure, surgery, or urinary catheter removal
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of BPH and multiple urological procedures, including suprapubic prostatectomy. He currently has a small catheter in place due to severe urethral stricture.
